remarks: A subset of a free module obtained by restricting the support set is a submodule. ` J ` is the set of forbidden unit vectors.  (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 4-Feb-2015.)

frlmsslss.c $e |- C = { x e. B | ( x |` J ) = ( J X. { .0. } ) } $.
frlmsslss $p |- ( ( R e. Ring /\ I e. V /\ J C_ I ) -> C e. U ) $.
